Key Arguments: The government should not have the power to censor speech, as it infringes on freedom of expression.
Individuals are capable of discerning misinformation and disinformation without government intervention.
The government itself is often a source of propaganda and misinformation.
The COVID-19 mandates were harmful and led to negative health outcomes, which the government should be ashamed of.
The proposed legislation could suppress truthful information by labeling it as misinformation.
The legislation could negatively impact democratic processes, such as the Voice referendum.
Notable Quotes: It can NOT be up to any individual especially a government paid employee, deciding what is right or wrong in anything that anyone in a free society has to say.
The recent COVID debacle is one such issue that the government should be ashamed of as people have DIED because of the illegal mandates forced on the public.
To exempt the government from any such restrictions is draconian, and shows we are going into a dictatorship form of government.
